description: This is a PHP source file defining the structure and behavior for generating and displaying various content control reports, including handling user interactions with report filters and dynamic content updates via AJAX.

methods.name: adjust_acs_tb
methods.description: Adjusts table headers and summaries for the visible data tables, assigning header IDs and linking td elements with corresponding th headers.

methods.name: ajaxDo
methods.description: Performs AJAX request to fetch report data based on mode and time frame, then updates the corresponding table with retrieved data and applies pagination if necessary.
